page.title: 05SCHOOLS IN RUDGWICK
page.content: Within the{SURVEY AREA}there are{THREE schools.One is a special unit designed to aid children who have{LEARNING}and {BEHAVIOURAL}difficulties,in particular {AUTISTIC}children and teenagers. This school,{DEDISHAM,}is located approxi- mately{3km EAST}of the village on the {A29.}Within the village there are{TWO{ {PRE-SCHOOL}educational establishments. The{PLAYGROUP}caters for children from {3_5}years and aims to develop{SOCIAL, {PHYSICAL & EDUCATIONAL}skills.The{NUR- {SERY}school has like aims but is some- what more{FORMAL}in approach. Situated at the lower end of Church St.is{PENN- {THORPE}a{PREPARATORY SCHOOL}for boys & and girls-{4-14}years of age.It offers {BOARDING FACILITIES}as well as places for{DAY PUPILS.}In contrast,{RUDGWICK {C.P.SCHOOL}is a{STATE}school which,un- til recently, consisted of a{TWO-SITE premises catering for pupils of{5-11.
